mapper.select: SELECT parent_id AS parentId, menu_name AS menuName, route_url AS routeUrl, route_view AS routeView, menu_type AS menuType, id AS id FROM sys_menu WHERE del_flag = 0 AND enable_flag =1 and menu_type in (0,1) order by order_num

SELECT sys_menu.id AS id, sys_menu.parent_id AS parentId, sys_menu.menu_name AS menuName, sys_menu.route_url AS routeUrl, sys_menu.route_view AS routeView, sys_menu.menu_type AS menuType FROM sys_user_role JOIN sys_role_menu ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role_menu.role_id JOIN sys_menu ON sys_role_menu.menu_id = sys_menu.id WHERE sys_menu.del_flag = 0 AND sys_menu.enable_flag = 1 AND sys_menu.menu_type IN ( 0, 1 ) and sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY sys_role_menu.menu_id ORDER BY sys_menu.order_num

SELECT sys_menu.perm FROM sys_user_role JOIN sys_role_menu ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role_menu.role_id JOIN sys_menu ON sys_role_menu.menu_id = sys_menu.id WHERE sys_menu.del_flag = 0 AND sys_menu.enable_flag = 1 AND sys_menu.menu_type = 2 and sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY sys_role_menu.menu_id ORDER BY sys_menu.order_num
